title: 1.28 cr registrations received under PM Surya Ghar Muft Bijli Yojana: Minister
description: 1.28 crore registrations for PM Surya Ghar Muft Bijli Yojana aim for 1 crore rooftops. Launched in February by PM Modi, 15 lakh applications were received.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
